title: SproutWorks - XinTianDi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health food cafe and educational retail space with multiple locations; this one opened June 2014 at 马当路185号. Offers a salad bar, soups, panini sandwiches, lunch combinations. Beverages include juices, flavored iced teas, and lemonades. Uses eco-friendly plates and cutlery.
